name: The Rosary of Ancient Blessings
description: A meditative rosary incorporating traditional Hebrew blessings and prayers, focusing on the character of God, presented with both Hebrew script and English translation.

cross.title: Opening Prayer
cross.content:
בָּרוּךְ אַתָּה ה' אֱלֹהֵינוּ מֶלֶךְ הָעוֹלָם, שֶׁהֶחֱיָנוּ וְקִיְּמָנוּ וְהִגִּיעָנוּ לַזְּמַן הַזֶּה. בְּנוֹכְחוּתְךָ, אָנוּ מְבַקְּשִׁים לְהִתְקָרֵב. אָמֵן.
(Baruch atah Adonai Eloheinu Melech ha'olam, shehecheyanu v'kiyemanu v'higianu lazman hazeh. B'nochchutcha, anu mevakshim l'hitkarev. Amen.)
Blessed are You, Lord our God, King of the universe, who has given us life, sustained us, and brought us to this moment. In Your presence, we seek to draw near. Amen.

firstLargeBead.title: Declaration of Faith
firstLargeBead.content:
שְׁמַע יִשְׂרָאֵל ה' אֱלֹהֵינוּ ה' אֶחָד.
(Shema Yisrael Adonai Eloheinu Adonai Echad.)
Hear, O Israel: The LORD our God, the LORD is one.
Deuteronomy 6:4

threeSmallBeads.content:
בָּרוּךְ אַתָּה ה' אֱלֹהֵינוּ מֶלֶךְ הָעוֹלָם, אֲשֶׁר קִדְּשָׁנוּ בְּמִצְוֹתָיו וְצִוָּנוּ עַל דִּבְרֵי תוֹרָה.
(Baruch atah Adonai Eloheinu Melech ha'olam, asher kid'shanu b'mitzvotav v'tzivanu al divrei Torah.)
Blessed are You, Lord our God, King of the universe, who has sanctified us with His commandments and commanded us concerning the words of Torah.

בָּרוּךְ אַתָּה ה', גּוֹאֵל יִשְׂרָאֵל.
(Baruch atah Adonai, go'el Yisrael.)
Blessed are You, Lord, Redeemer of Israel.

בָּרוּךְ אַתָּה ה', רוֹפֵא חוֹלִים.
(Baruch atah Adonai, rofeh cholim.)
Blessed are You, Lord, Healer of the sick.

secondLargeBead.title: Prayer for Guidance
secondLargeBead.content:
דְּרָכֶיךָ ה' הוֹדִיעֵנִי, אֹרְחוֹתֶיךָ לַמְּדֵנִי. הַדְרִיכֵנִי בַאֲמִתֶּךָ וְלַמְּדֵנִי, כִּי אַתָּה אֱלֹהֵי יִשְׁעִי, אוֹתְךָ קִוִּיתִי כָּל הַיּוֹם.
(Derachecha Adonai hodi'eini, orchotecha lamdeini. Hadricheni va'amitecha v'lamdeini, ki atah Elohei yish'i, otcha kiviti kol hayom.)
Lead us, O Lord, in Your truth and teach us, for You are the God of our salvation; for You we wait all the day long.
Psalm 25:5

largeBead.title: Blessing the Creator
largeBead.content:
בָּרוּךְ אַתָּה ה' אֱלֹהֵינוּ מֶלֶךְ הָעוֹלָם, בּוֹרֵא פְּרִי הָעֵץ.
(Baruch atah Adonai Eloheinu Melech ha'olam, borei p'ri ha'eitz.)
Blessed are You, Lord our God, King of the universe, who creates the fruit of the tree.
For all creation testifies to Your glory.
Psalm 19:1

refrain.content:
בָּרוּךְ אַתָּה ה', יוֹצֵר אוֹר.
(Baruch atah Adonai, Yotzer Or.)
Blessed are You, Lord, Fashioner of Light.

largeBead.title: Blessing the Provider
largeBead.content:
בָּרוּךְ אַתָּה ה' אֱלֹהֵינוּ מֶלֶךְ הָעוֹלָם, הַמּוֹצִיא לֶחֶם מִן הָאָרֶץ.
(Baruch atah Adonai Eloheinu Melech ha'olam, haMotzi lechem min ha'aretz.)
Blessed are You, Lord our God, King of the universe, who brings forth bread from the earth.
You open Your hand and satisfy the desire of every living thing.
Psalm 145:16

refrain.content:
בָּרוּךְ אַתָּה ה', הַזָּן אֶת הַכֹּל.
(Baruch atah Adonai, hazan et hakol.)
Blessed are You, Lord, who sustains all.

largeBead.title: Blessing the Redeemer
largeBead.content:
בָּרוּךְ אַתָּה ה' אֱלֹהֵינוּ מֶלֶךְ הָעוֹלָם, אֲשֶׁר נָתַן לָנוּ אֶת דֶּרֶךְ הַחַיִּים.
(Baruch atah Adonai Eloheinu Melech ha'olam, asher natan lanu et Derech HaChayim.)
Blessed are You, Lord our God, King of the universe, who has given us the Way of Life.
For in Christ, we have redemption through His blood.
Ephesians 1:7

refrain.content:
בָּרוּךְ אַתָּה ה', גּוֹאֵל.
(Baruch atah Adonai, Go'el.)
Blessed are You, Lord, Redeemer.

largeBead.title: Blessing the Holy One
largeBead.content:
קָדוֹשׁ קָדוֹשׁ קָדוֹשׁ ה' צְבָאוֹת, מְלֹא כָל הָאָרֶץ כְּבוֹדוֹ.
(Kadosh, kadosh, kadosh Adonai Tzva'ot, m'lo chol ha'aretz k'vodo.)
Holy, holy, holy is the LORD of hosts; the whole earth is full of His glory.
Isaiah 6:3

refrain.content:
בָּרוּךְ אַתָּה ה', הַקָּדוֹשׁ.
(Baruch atah Adonai, HaKadosh.)
Blessed are You, Lord, the Holy One.

largeBead.title: Blessing of Peace
largeBead.content:
בָּרוּךְ אַתָּה ה' אֱלֹהֵינוּ מֶלֶךְ הָעוֹלָם, עוֹשֶׂה הַשָּׁלוֹם.
(Baruch atah Adonai Eloheinu Melech ha'olam, Oseh HaShalom.)
Blessed are You, Lord our God, King of the universe, who makes peace.
May the Lord bless you and keep you; may the Lord make His face shine upon you and be gracious to you; may the Lord lift up His countenance upon you and give you peace.
Numbers 6:24-26

refrain.content:
שָׁלוֹם עֲלֵיכֶם.
(Shalom Aleichem.)
Peace be upon you.
